name: One Night at Fredbear's
description:
You don't remember how you got here but you've awakened in the parts and service loading bay of your favourite restaurant "Fredbear's Family Diner", normally a place where fun and fantasy come to life after dark it's almost silent and the distant hums and whirring of your favourite characters running their night routines, what's even worse however is that they still watch out for children and have started to stare at you. did you hear that? was it extra footsteps? was that shadow always there? is the darkness thicker than it was or is that just your imagination? maybe you should just curl up and pretend this isn't happening.

How to play:
Survive until 6am, each hour a new animatronic will become active, they're scattered around the location and behave similar, avoid them and their gaze, don't let your fears swallow you whole.

Controls:
W/A/S/D or Arrow keys to move
Space bar to crouch
